instruction: List three ways to prevent cyberbullying
output: Three ways to prevent cyberbullying are to encourage positive behaviors online, educate children and teens about the risks of cyberbullying, and report any suspicious activity. Encouraging alternative behaviors online such as sharing compliments and being kind can help prevent cyberbullying from occurring. Educating children and teens about the risks of cyberbullying can help to raise awareness and build understanding of the issue. Finally, reporting any suspicious or malicious activities can help prevent cyberbullying incidents from taking place.
